headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: custom_audience_ids
parameters.description: A list of Audience IDs. Length range is [1, 100].

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Default value: 1 . Value range: â‰¥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Defaults is 10 . Value range: 1-100.

fields.name: shared
fields.description: Whether this audience is shared with others. Enum values: True , False .

fields.name: is_creator
fields.description: Whether this advertiser is the owner of the audience. Enum values: true , false . You can use shared and is_creator to check audience ownership and shared status. The rules are as follows: 1. shared = true and is_creator = true : The advertiser is the owner and the audience is shared to others. 2. shared = true and is_creator = false : The advertiser is NOT the owner and the audience is shared by others. 3. shared = false and is_creator = true : The advertiser is the owner and the audience has not been shared to others.

fields.name: cover_num
fields.description: Coverage, or number of matched users on TikTok.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: Time when the audience was created. GMT time.

fields.name: is_valid
fields.description: Audience availability. An audience becomes available after it has been processed. An audience becomes invalid after it is expired.

fields.name: is_expiring
fields.description: Whether an audience is expiring. When an audience is expiring, it will expire in less than 60 days.

fields.name: expired_time
fields.description: Time when the audience expires, in the format of "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS".

fields.name: audience_type
fields.description: Audience type. Enum values: Customer File Audience ( Customer File Audience ). Engagement Audience ( Engagement Audience ). App Activity Audience ( App Activity Audience ). Website Audience ( Website Traffic Audience ). Lookalike Audience ( Lookalike Audience ). Lead Generation ( Lead Generation Audience ) Rule Business Account ( Business Account Audience ) Rule ad shop ( Shop Activity Audience ) Partner (Partner Audience) Challenge (Challenge Audience) Preferred Population (Premium Audience) Note : Currently, Partner Audience, Challenge Audience and Premium Audience cannot be created through the API.

fields.name: calculate_type
fields.description: Encryption type, only applies to customer file audience. For enum values, see Enumeration - Encryption Type .

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
